scenario_text.value: Gaaah!
Raaaaaahrrr!

(Good! Renamon has gotten Miyuki away from
Arukenimon!)
Oooh...
Miyuki!
Sis— ...Hey! Are you okay?
*huff* *huff* *huff*...
Finally, our connection with you is cut.

But I’ll give you one chance to avoid having
to experience true hell.

Tell us everything you know.
How do we get back home?

And why was Miyuki your “maiden”?
What were you planning?
What was that? Speak up. I couldn’t hear you.
I said...you can go to hell... Hee hee hee...

Maybe not here, and maybe not now, but this
world will eventually consume you all...
What do you mean by that?

So close... Just a little while longer, and
the darkness will have you.

A world of utter darkness, with no up or
down. The stillness of death...
What?!
Hey! Enough with your creepy fantasies!
I said...you can go to hell... Hee hee hee...

Maybe not here, and maybe not now, but this
world will eventually consume you all...
Just like the two already taken by the fog!
You monster!

No, Kaito! Don’t let her get to you! Takuma,
say something!

(Is Arukenimon the one that understands the
boundary between worlds, as Jijimon said?)

(I don’t think so, but still, she seems to
know something we don’t.)
(I need to hear what she has to say.)

(I have to at least try asking the most
important remaining question.)
(What should I ask Arukenimon about?)
How to get back home.
The maiden.
The boundary.
How do we return to our world?

I want you to tell us how to return to our
world. If you do, we’ll let you live.

Heh... Heheh... So, you think this is mercy?
How selfish can you get?

You all go back home, and what of us?
We’re supposed to suffer for all eternity?

Living in constant fear in our collapsing
world...
Arukenimon, you have told more than enough.
The maiden.

What was that “maiden” thing all about?
What did you plan on doing with Miyuki?

I was certain you were going to ask me how
you could get back to your world...

Of course I want to know that, but you were
putting Miyuki in danger.
I need to know why, so we keep everyone safe.
What’s this? Consideration for your comrades?

Fine, I’ll share this one tidbit. Our Master
requires the maiden.
Master?

Not only are you useless but also giving away
information? You truly are beyond helping.
The boundary.
Who knows about the boundary between worlds?
Ha! Who indeed?
So you know then?

So clever...
But why would I tell you that?

That’s right, you don’t need to tell them.
Either way, you shall be silenced.
Who’s that?!
P-Piedmon?!
You were a fool to the end.
No, no! I don’t want to die! Help me!

There can be only one punishment for failing
in your duty. Death!
Rrk!
No! Why? Aren’t you on the same side?

It’s very simple.
A useless pawn is to be discarded.
How...heartless.
And now...one more stands in my way?
Shall I at last be done with you?
Arrrgh!
Renamon?!
Urgh!

(Damn! Piedmon forced Miyuki out of
Renamon’s arms and grabbed her himself!)
Come, maiden! For our Master...
Stop, monster!
Kaito, don’t.
What?!
Dracmon? And Agumon and Labramon too?
(They’re shaking...)

That guy’s...too much. I’m serious.
He’s just too strong...

He’s not like anything we’ve fought before.
I don’t see any way we can beat him.

You’re not going anywhere...
I’ll protect her by myself!
Renamon?!

You can’t! Not when you’re injured like that.
You need to rest!
Let go of me. I’m going! I will get her back!

You’re shaking too.
Can’t you see there’s no way to win this one?

We need to find a new strategy. Because we
have to rescue Miyuki no matter what...

Shut up! I can’t trust you lot...
I can’t trust YOU!

You’d only end up abandoning her again.
That’s how it always goes.
I’m the only one who can truly protect her!
Renamon!
What should we do, Takuma?
...We can only go forward.

They might know about our world, but we can’t
ignore the fact that they have Miyuki.

He was heading west. Towards the factory we
were going to from the beginning.

It’s simple. We just need to keep going
towards original goal.
...Yeah, maybe.

Whether we decide to learn more about our
enemy first, or to attack immediately...

Either way, we still have to go to the same
place. The factory to the west...
